column1:
Additional HTTP headers in format Key: Value (one per line). Example:
X-Custom-Header: value
X-Another-Header: another-value
column2:
Additional HTTP headers in format Key: Value (one per line). Example:
X-Custom-Header: value
X-Another-Header: another-value

column1: Authorization header value for authentication. For Grafana Cloud, use format: Basic [base64(instance_id:api_token)]. For other services, use their required format.
column2: Authorization header value for authentication. For Grafana Cloud, use format: Basic [base64(instance_id:api_token)]. For other services, use their required format.

column1: Identifier for this service in traces (e.g., "maho-production", "maho-staging").
column2: Identifier for this service in traces (e.g., "maho-production", "maho-staging").

column1: OTLP endpoint URL for trace exports (must end with /v1/traces). Example: https://otlp-gateway-prod-eu-west-2.grafana.net/otlp/v1/traces
column2: OTLP endpoint URL for trace exports (must end with /v1/traces). Example: https://otlp-gateway-prod-eu-west-2.grafana.net/otlp/v1/traces

column1: Percentage of requests to trace. Enter a value between 0.0 and 1.0 (1.0 = 100%, 0.1 = 10%, 0.01 = 1%). Lower values reduce data volume and costs.
column2: Percentage of requests to trace. Enter a value between 0.0 and 1.0 (1.0 = 100%, 0.1 = 10%, 0.01 = 1%). Lower values reduce data volume and costs.
